name: Cookies and Cream
description: Bred by Exotic Genetix, Cookies and Cream is a hybrid cross between Starfighter and an undisclosed Girl Scout Cookies phenotype. This sweet-tasting variety provides long-lasting relief for patients treating symptoms throughout the day, but high doses can induce an early night’s sleep. Cookies and Cream took first place in the hybrid category of the 2014 Denver Cannabis Cup.
descriptionPlain: Bred by Exotic Genetix, Cookies and Cream is a hybrid cross between Starfighter and an undisclosed Girl Scout Cookies phenotype. This sweet-tasting variety provides long-lasting relief for patients treating symptoms throughout the day, but high doses can induce an early night’s sleep. Cookies and Cream took first place in the hybrid category of the 2014 Denver Cannabis Cup.
aka: Cookies n Cream, Cookies and Creme, Cookies & Cream, Cookies & Creme

highlightedReviews.text: This strain is AMAZING!! I have a lot of stress/anxiety and I also smoke for my PMDD. It really helps with muscle cramps/soreness. I've also had it help a headache. I have high blood pressure, and it lowered my blood pressure down to around 110/60. This strain completely relaxed and de-stressed me, completely. It took away any anger/frustration/irritation I had, and replaced it with a very peaceful, calm and serene feeling. I was able to relax, watch some tv, surf the net via my phone in bed, without couch locking and passing right out. I was still alert, so it didn't give me an overly stony feeling either. The other times I smoked more, it def helped me go to sleep. I also have pretty bad insomnia. It didn't just knock me out, but more like, let me slip into a nice relaxing sleep. I always wake up feeling refreshed, and rejuvenated after smoking this strain. I also found that it made me feel somewhat... How to put this, erotically charged? Subtly though. It did not give me the munchies either.

Looks nice, smells better, and tastes great! Definitely something if you want a break from the usual pungent, citrus/diesel type flavors. High is smooth and relaxed, a good strain if you have trouble falling asleep because it is easy on the throat and has a mellow aftertaste.

articles.title: The 2015 NorCal Cannabis Cup Winners
articles.author: Lisa Rough
articles.text:
There was some beautiful competition at the NorCal High Times Cannabis Cup this past weekend and we were there to cover all of the action. Among all of the hubbub and hoopla, here are the winners of this year’s 2015 NorCal Cannabis Cup:
 
CANNABIS FLOWER WINNERS

Best Sativa Cannabis Strains
1st Place: Schlemons by The Source Genetics
2nd Place: Super Silver Haze by Life is Good
3rd Place: Super Glue by Vallejo Patients Care
 
Best Indica Cannabis Strains
1st Place: Zkittles by 3rd Gen Family
2nd Place: Kosher Kush from DNA by Greenwolf Los Angeles and Cali Kush Farms
3rd Place: 24K OG Kush by Strain Collective with Pearl Pharma
 
Best Hybrid Cannabis Strains
1st Place: Orange Crush by Cannabiotix
2nd Place: Tahoe Chem by C.R.A.F.T.
3rd Place: Chiquita Banana by Utopia Meds – Santa Cruz
 
Best CBD Cannabis Flower
1st Place: CBD OG by C.R.A.F.T.
2nd Place: Doctor Cookies by Northstar Holistic Collective
3rd Place: Sunkiss CBD by California Growers Guild
 
CANNABIS CONCENTRATE WINNERS

Best Sativa Cannabis Concentrates
1st Place: Citrix #4 by Gold Coast Collection with Apothecary 420
2nd Place: Purple Tangie by Zeinstein Gardens & Loudpack Extracts
3rd Place: Double Tangie Banana by Crockett Family Farms
 
Best Indica Cannabis Concentrates
1st Place: AHHS Brand OG by Alternative Herbal Health Services
2nd Place: Banana OG by Crockett Family Farms
3rd Place: Crown OG Live Resin by Prime Extractions
 
Best Hybrid Cannabis Concentrates
1st Place: Emperors Mandarins “Shatter” by the Kind Center with Unregistered Extracts
2nd Place: Emperors Mandarins by Greenwolf Collective X Cali Kush Farms
3rd Place: Crown OG x Dab Vader OG Zombie Resin by Crown Genetics
 
Best Non-Solvent Hash Products
1st Place: Kimbo Kush Cubantech Drysift by Cubanhashqueen with Exotic Genetix
2nd Place: Cookies & Cream Cubantech Drysift by Exotic Genetix
3rd Place: Peaches ‘N Cream by Full Flava Extracts with E.T. Extracts
 
CANNABIS-INFUSED EDIBLE WINNERS

1st Place: Dark Chocolate Macaroons by Utopia Meds
2nd Place: Pineapple Delight Bites by Lifted Edibles
3rd Place: Cinnamon Maple Tree Hugger – Om Edibles & Gold Drop Collaboration
 
CANNABIS TOPICAL WINNERS

1st Place: Crown OG “It’s the Balm Haling Salve” by Crown Genetics
2nd Place: Honey Pot Bear Butter by Honey Pot with Pure Joy Collective
3rd Place: Absorb CBD Topical Relief by Absorb with Seasonal Apothecary
 
HIGH CBD PRODUCT WINNERS

Best High CBD Cannabis Concentrates
1st Place: Goji D.C. Live Resin by Moxie Genetics
2nd Place: ACDC by Scapegoat Genetics
3rd Place: ACDC by Dankman Extrax
 
Best High CBD Cannabis Edibles
1st Place: Raw CBD Sipping Cacao by Om Edibles All Female Collective
2nd Place: Beezle’s CBD Brulee – Chocolate Orange by Beezle Extracts
3rd Place: CBD/THC Honey by Baked Beez with the W.E.E.D. Studio City

articles.title: The 2015 Denver Cannabis Cup Winners
articles.author: Bailey Rahn
articles.text:
This year's High Times Cannabis Cup winners are in! Check out all the winners from the 2015 Cannabis Cup, which took place over the weekend before 4/20 in Denver, Colorado.
 
   Best U.S. Sativa Flower
1st Place: Ghost Train Haze #13 by Greenway Las Vegas
2nd Place: Veganic Strawberry Cough by Buds & Roses of LA
3rd Place: Green Crack by Christopher Stine
 
   Best Colorado Sativa Flower
1st Place: Ghost Train Haze by Greenman Cannabis
2nd Place: Sweet Silver Haze by Rocky Mountain High
3rd Place: Pootie Tang by Starbuds
 
   Best U.S. Indica Flower
1st Place: Granddaddy Purple by Herbal Healing
2nd Place: Kosher Kush by Greenwolf LA with Kushco
3rd Place: DaVinci OG by Greenwolf LA with Ghost Crow
 
   Best Colorado Indica Flower
1st Place: Louie XIII by Greenman Cannabis
2nd Place: Colorado Bubba by MMJ America Boulder
3rd Place: Black Fire by Docs Apothecary and the Ethos Collective
 
   Best U.S Hybrid Flower
1st Place: T.S.T. Cookies by Greenwolf and Top Shelf Terps
2nd Place: Cali Kush Farms Emperor Cookie Dough by Greenwolf LA
3rd Place: Mega Wellness OG by The Weed, The Wellness Earth Energy Dispensary with Nameless Genetics
 
   Best Colorado Hybrid Flower
1st Place: Kong by Allgreens
2nd Place: Starkiller by Greenman Cannabis
3rd Place: OG KB Cookies by MMJ America Downtown
 
   Best Sativa Concentrate
1st Place: Strawberry Lemonade Live Resin by Crockett Family Farms/Dabblicious Extracts
2nd Place: Wonderland Live Resin by Greenwolf LA with Dabblicious, Crockett Family Farm, and G.C. Rebellion Farms
3rd Place: Tangie #17 by Gold Coast Extracts
 
   Best Indica Concentrate
1st Place: Crown OG Sugar by Greenwolf LA/Nature's Lab Extracts/Crown OG
2nd Place: Space Valley OG (Fresh Frozen) by Pink House with Incredibles
3rd Place: Kush Company OG Live Resin Batter by Kush Company with Nature's Lab Extracts and the W.E.E.D. Studio City
 
   Best Hybrid Concentrate
1st Place: B Mega Wellness OG by Nameless Genetics with The Weed of Studio City
2nd Place: Crown OG Crumble by Greenwolf LA/Nature's Lab Extracts/Crown OG
3rd Place: Skywalker OG Kush by Dab Vader/Vader Extracts
 
   Best Non-Solvent Hash
1st Place: Cookies and Cream Cubantech Drysift by Exotic Genetix
2nd Place: Strawberry Banangieland 120-73u by Trichome Heavy Extracts with G.C. Rebellion Farms, Greenwolf LA, and DNA
3rd Place: Kimbo Kush Cubantech Drysift by Cuban Hash Queen with Exotic Genetix
 
   Best CBD Flower
1st Place: Tora Bora by MMJ America
2nd Place: The Nubia by Aficionado / FreeBorn Selections
3rd Place: Sleeping Giant by Elemental Seeds
 
   Best CBD Concentrate
1st Place: OG Tonic by The Smokers Club with Garden of Weedn
2nd Place: Cannatonic by Natural Mystic Cannabis Caregivers
3rd Place: Industrial Hemp CBD Extract by ISODIOL S.A.
 
   People's Choice
1st Place: Cindy White by the Green Solution
2nd Place: GRiZ Kush by Native Roots
3rd Place: Bubba Kush by The Clinic Colorado
